
# Notes

## About this...

### Class

```csharp
/// <remarks>
///     <note title="About this class">
///         Any prototype code related to the DOC System Code should be located here.<br/>
///     </note>
///     <note type = "warning" title= "About this class">
///         Please keep in mind that code in this class:
///         <list type="bullet">
///             <item>Should not be used in production</item>
///             <item>Is most likely super ugly</item>
///             <item>Probably doesn't follow best practices</item>
///         </list>
///     </note>
/// </remarks>
```

### Method

```csharp
/// <remarks>
///     <note title="About this method">
///         Critical logs indicate a critical failure with the Tingen Web Service.<br/>
///     </note>
/// </remarks>
```

